name: Navigation Dots
description: The Navigation Dots —Åomponent is a navigation element designed for use in web applications. It provides a visually appealing way to navigate through different sections on a webpage.

properties.name: sections
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the array of sections.

properties.name: background
properties.label: Dot Background
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the color of the dot container.

properties.name: color
properties.label: Dot Color
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the color of an internal dot.

properties.name: tooltip
properties.label: Tooltip
properties.settingTooltip: Flag indicating whether a tooltip will be shown when hovering over a dot by default or not.

properties.name: tooltipBackground
properties.label: Tooltip Background
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the background of the tooltip.

properties.name: tooltipColor
properties.label: Tooltip Color
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the color of the tooltip.

eventHandlers.name: onClick
eventHandlers.label: On Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the user clicks on the component.
